General.Name: Pinlive Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: Pinlive Foods Co., Ltd. imports and distributes food products in China, Germany, Spain, Thailand, Malaysia, Korea, Ukraine, and Australia. It offers milk under Deya brand; beer under Valentin brand; olive oil under Pinelli brand; breakfast grains under Hannrae brand; butterfly crisps under Yane brand; biscuits under Guyou brand; and pats under Rooster brand. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Mr. Guo Hui  Zhu
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Sec. of the Board & Director
